traits.Charge: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10+1d4 + 8 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
traits.Sure-Footed: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.
